scene.title: Life and death

text.p: Therefore, when meeting the Raksha,
the「Eagle」suddenly had the illusion of time repeating itself.
At first sight of this person,「Eagle」's back went abruptly cold,
An alarm bell sounded instinctively, telling him that this man was a 「scourge」.
At the time, the「Scourge」stayed in the caravan's carriage and enjoyed a small cabin exclusively.
Among the dozens of caravans, he was the only one who enjoyed this extraordinary treatment.

scene.text: When「Eagle」's sword brushed up the screen, the Raksha was talking to something.

text.p: The man knelt on one knee. His tone was calm and easy-going, as if he was asking a close travel companion, but looking around;
There was no one else in the compartment, only a coffin.

scene.text: Only him, and a coffin.
scene.dialog: Raksha:「Ich werde lösen」(I'll take care of it.)

text.p: This person wasn't speaking in Raksha language, and「Eagle」couldn't understand it.
But this strange and terrifying scene had him sweating bullets.

scene.text: He couldn't help but look up at the weird man who was talking to the coffin:

text.p: The Raksha person was about twenty years old, tall and not strong looking.
He obviously had some skills, but he was definitely not a master.

scene.text: Just by observing his appearance and shape, you could know a little about what martial arts a person trained in.

text.p: If you had bulging muscles, you were a martial artist who practices Waijiaquan.
This martial arts allowed one's fist and feet strikes to break gold and gravel, and it was no problem to resist ordinary blunt weapons.

scene.text: But「Eagle」did not put such people in his eyes.

text.p: Truly skilled people emphasized balance throughout the whole body. Blindly insisting on fierce effort would lead to a loss of flexibility.
A truly skilled person was one who possessed both speed and strength.

scene.text: And masters of inner power had another set of tricks.

text.p: Inner martial arts exercised inner strength, that is, meridians and 「Zhen Qi」.
Though the appearance of such a person would be modest, their presence would be strong. Observing one's gaze and breathing, it was possible to gauge the depth of one's inner strength.

scene.text: Needless to say,「Eagle」saw through the Raksha man's strength at a glance, and found it to be of no significance, and from his chaotic breathing rhythm, it was apparent that this man had never learned superior internal skills either.

motion.img: 老鹰-专注-拔刀预备-远景

scene.text: 「Eagle」 said, his hand dropping on the handle of his scimitar.
He hated the Raksha the most, and it wass even more unlucky to see a coffin in the daytime. The two taboos merge into one, and 「Eagle」 had an impulse to see blood.

text.p: He was already full of blood debts, so why not add another life?
But... the scimitar was not out of its sheath.

scene.text: The Raksha sighed, then whispered a few words to the coffin,

text.p: and then glanced at the leader of the gang.

scene.text: His eyes were green like jade, like two carefully polished emeralds.
Somehow, a warning sounded in 「Eagle」's heart again.
The Raksha man calmly asked in a lame but clear Chinese dialect:
This question had no background and was too inexplicable, but 「Eagle」 nodded.
The Raksha man pointed to the ground:
scene.dialog: 「Eagle」:「This is mine, and you are mine too. Come out .」
scene.text: The Raksha didn't say anything, but slowly stretched out, struggling to support his knees with his hands, as if having a hard time getting up.

text.p: [em italic]This Raksha, acting like he's a big deal.[/em]
「Eagle」couldn't help cursing in his heart.
[em italic]I can't wait to see what kind of expression you will show if I sell you to a Baihui Slave trader.[/em]

scene.text: He suddenly missed the past. Ten years ago, he would have already taken the scimitar out and chopped off this beautiful head.

text.p: Dead Rakshas were worthless, but the living Rakshas were rare goods.
Baihui slave traders prefer them, and they always gave a good price.

scene.text: 「Eagle」looked at the obedient Raksha, suddenly a little curious.

text.p: Why did he speak to the coffin?
This person occupied a whole room alone, how mysterious...
Yes, he didn't want people to know what was in the coffin.

scene.text: Then…… what was in it?

text.p: ……What would it be? ?

motion.img: 老鹰-专注-拔刀预备-中景

scene.text: The scimitar flashed and landed on the Raksha's neck. 「Eagle」 pointed at the coffin in front of him:
He gave a simple order and got an unexpected answer.
The deep green eyes glanced at him very slowly.

text.p: 「Eagle」had seen countless people in his life,
And the eyes he had seen were countless.
Fear, hatred, anger, unwillingness, pain……
He had not only seen it, but was often the source of all these emotions.
A blade on the neck was the best truth serum in the world,
it could completely expose a person's deepest heart.
「Eagle」was numb to dying eyes,
and was indifferent to their dying emotions.
He had seen too many of those.
However, there had never been a look like the one in the eyes of this Raksha,
Mixed with determination, madness, cruelty, pleasure, compassion and...

scene.text: [em bold]…… Contempt[/em] ?

text.p: [em italic]Is that.[/em]
「Eagle」gave a chuckle in his heart and swallowed and spit.
This Raksha man didn't out him in his eyes at all.
In the eyes of this person,「Eagle」, leader of the Golden Sand Gang , was no different than a grain of sand in the desert.
He had neither value nor meaning.
He even had the illusion that in the next second, the Raksha would walk over this grain of sand,
And it would be as natural as a stroll.

scene.text: So he put down the scimitar.

text.p: 'It's not because I'm afraid',「Eagle」told himself:
He would never be afraid of a Raksha.

scene.text: However, the feeling in his heart was more shame than fear, and he even wanted to run away from the person in front of him.
Leaving this sentence,「Eagle」turned and walked away.

text.p: In the distance, a wisp of smoke rose slowly.
This was the signal to guide the Golden Sand Gang’s return journey.

scene.text: 「Eagle」 was immersed in his own thoughts and didn’t say much to them, going straight into the post
The sand bandits who guarded the house exchanged glances and breathed a sigh of relief at the same time.
But before this breath reached his throat, a majestic voice rang in his ears:

motion.img: 老鹰-普通-抱胸有刀-远景

scene.text: The leader of the Golden Sand Gang put his arms around his chest, his eyes as sharp as an eagle.

text.p: He looked up and down at the two people in front of him,
glanced at the sand not far away,
and cast a meaningful look at the inn.

scene.text: 「Eagle」smiled, but his eyes weren't smiling at all.
